===  07.12.2009 Release 1.4.0 ===
Updated to GTK+ 2.18 appearance:
  * Backup files are hidden by default
  * GTK+ remembers the sorted state of the file list
  * File sizes are shown by default
  * Icons removed from some buttons
  * When new devices are mounted (/media folder), bookmarks changed, or files modified in the current dir, the file chooser is "live" updated.

Tested on the following platforms:
  * Fedora 12
  * Ubuntu 9.10
  * !OpenSuse 11.2
  * !OpenSolaris 2009.06

=== 11.10.2009 Added test app ===
To launch the demo application, used for testing, double click on gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar. Or on the command line run "java -jar gtkjfilechooser-demo.jar":

[http://gtkjfilechooser.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/GtkJFileChooser/site/img/FileChooserDemo.png]

The demo is completly based on the Sun Java !FileChooserDemo in $JAVA_HOME/demo/jfc/!FileChooserDemo.
